Class Ghost

  • Direct Known Subclasses:

extends Unit
    A non-player unit.
    Author:
    Jeroen Roosen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        protected Ghost​(Map<Direction,​Sprite> spriteMap,
                int moveInterval,
                int intervalVariation)
        Creates a new ghost.
        Parameters:
        spriteMap - The sprites for every direction.
        moveInterval - The base interval of movement.
        intervalVariation - The variation of the interval.

    • Method Detail

      • nextMove

        public Direction nextMove()
        Calculates the next move for this unit and returns the direction to move in.

        Precondition: The NPC occupies a square (hasSquare() holds).

        Returns:
        The direction to move in, or null if no move could be devised.

      • nextAiMove

        public abstract Optional<Direction> nextAiMove()
        Tries to calculate a move based on the behaviour of the npc.
        Returns:
        an optional containing the move or empty if the current state of the game makes the ai move impossible

      • getSprite

        public Sprite getSprite()
        Description copied from class: Unit
        Returns the sprite of this unit.
        Specified by:
        getSprite in class Unit
        Returns:
        The sprite of this unit.

      • getInterval

        public long getInterval()
        The time that should be taken between moves.
        Returns:
        The suggested delay between moves in milliseconds.

      • randomMove

        protected Direction randomMove()
        Determines a possible move in a random direction.
        Returns:
        A direction in which the ghost can move, or null if the ghost is shut in by inaccessible squares.
